functions.tag: {pages:["[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #27\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject resists and is killed before being able to be put into their cell.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Corporalki, Kerch\"]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #28\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject shows no effects.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Etherealki, Kerch\"]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #29\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Lost five Drueskelle upon applying the dosage.\",\"\\n\",\"Note: Apply one way glass to the cells.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Corporalki, Ravka\"]"],title:"Druesje Reports #1",author:"Jarl Brum"}

{pages:["[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #147\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject kills themselves before the dosage can be applied.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Corporalki, Novyi Zem\"]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #148\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject is able to propell themselves through the air at will and is able to resist gravity without large effort.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Etherealki, Shu Han\"]"],title:"Druesje Reports #2",author:"Jarl Brum"}

{pages:["[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #323\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject succumbs to Parem after 3 hours of resisting.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Corporalki, Kerch\"]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #324\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject succumbs to Parem after 5 minutes of resisting.\",\"\\n\",\"A lower Dosage is adviced.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Etherealki, Ravka\"]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #325\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject is able to instantly create core cloth by holding four pieces of fabric in one and eight iron ingots in the other hand.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Materialki, Ravka\"]"],title:"Druesje Reports #3",author:"Jarl Brum"}

{pages:["[\"\",{\"text\":\"Entry #457\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"The subject is able to transform two parts of iron into equal parts gold under the influence of Parem.\",\"\\n\",\"\\n\",{\"text\":\"Subject:\",\"bold\":true},\"\\n\",\"Materialki, Shu Han\"]"],title:"Druesje Reports #4",author:"Jarl Brum"}
